column2: # Add episode title to each segment
# Draw the full episode bar (grey) for each episode
aes(xmin = 0, xmax = episode_length_seconds, ymin = 0, ymax = 1, group = show),
# Highlight Trump's airtime (top half of the bar)
aes(xmin = start, xmax = end, ymin = 0.5, ymax = 1, group = episode),
# Highlight Harris's airtime (bottom half of the bar)
aes(xmin = start, xmax = end, ymin = 0, ymax = 0.5, group = episode),
# Add tick marks for every minute and every 15 seconds
breaks = seq(0, max(snl_airtime_processed$episode_length_seconds), by = 60),  # Tick marks every minute
minor_breaks = seq(0, max(snl_airtime_processed$episode_length_seconds), by = 15),  # Minor tick marks every 15 seconds
labels = function(x) sprintf("%d:%02d", x %/% 60, x %% 60)  # Format as mm:ss
title = "SNL Airtime Visualization for All Episodes",
subtitle = "Red: Trump Airtime | Blue: Harris Airtime",
strip.text = element_text(face = "bold", size = 10),  # Episode titles in facets
